Text: Flash capture only got the last 3 min. of the game, so NO ENTIRE GAME. Crappy software recorded for over 2 hours and media info says 2Hr 28min, but only the last 3 min are there.

Nepotu has the OSU/Wichita State game uploaded.  Not sure about the other ones.

thetorrentlord: Thanks for all of your OSU sports and Dispatch torrents!  I'm interested in the entire Arizona game, if it's not too much trouble.  I'll seed for a while, too.
